title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 1, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 1, 2022
description:
Gary fills in for an absent Mark Geragos and brings Adam up to speed on a new lawsuit today that is poised to rock the NFL and gets Adam fired up about masks.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
